page.title: 20FARMING
page.content: There are lots of farms in our area and quite a few people work on these farms.We get lots of food from farm animals_ from pigs we get pork and bacon _ from cows _ milk and beef _ from lambs we get meat. To_day the farmers have machinery to help them with their work. Anglesey aluminiym owns a lot of land on Holy Island their main farm is TY Mawr and this is next our school. Ty mawr is a large farm but there are many smaller ones on Holyhead too.These farmers keep a few animals _ cows _ sheep _ hens etc.Sometimes these farmers allow their land to be used for camping too.
